title: U.S. House's antitrust report hints at break-up of Big Tech firms: lawmaker
text: The U.S. House of Representatives antitrust report on Big Tech firms contains a "thinly veiled call to break up" the companies, Republican Congressman Ken Buck said in a draft response seen by Reuters.

title: New information about Facebook's Instagram acquisition delayed House antitrust report, source says
text: The report is expected to conclude the more than year-long investigation into Apple, Amazon, Facebook and Google, and will suggest potential areas for reform in the antitrust laws.

title: Facebook Stock Is Still the Best Play in the FAANG Group
text: Covid-19 has slowed down Facebook stock more than many of its tech rivals. However, the long-term outlook of the shares remains attractive.

title: China's Didi Chuxing partners with WhatsApp for ride-hailing in Brazil
text: Brazilian ride-hailing service 99, controlled by China's Didi Chuxing Technology Co Ltd, has partnered with WhatsApp to accept orders on the chat platform owned by Facebook in a move that would allow users to summon cars without using another app.

title: How Facebook Could Surge 40% in 2021, Crushing Apple and Tesla
text: FB stock has lagged its tech peers in 2020. Here's why Facebook could rebound 40% in 2021 as the pandemic subsides and ad spending returns The post How Facebook Could Surge 40% in 2021, Crushing Apple and Tesla appeared first on InvestorPlace.

title: Facebook, Belgian watchdog face off over who should police company
text: Facebook and Belgium's privacy watchdog sparred on Monday at Europe's top court over which data protection authority has the power to police the U.S. social media giant in a case that could escalate its privacy fights across the EU.

title: Instagram is adding more shopping features, and it already has a head start on TikTok
text: While the effort to add shopping to Reels was expected, it's still a quick rollout since the feature only launched two months ago. But adding the shopping feature soon could give the company a leg up on TikTok, its Reels competitor.

title: Instagram expands shopping on IGTV, plans test of shopping on Reels
text: Instagram this morning announced the global expansion of its Instagram Shopping service across IGTV. The product, which lets you watch a video then checkout with a few taps, offers creators and influencers a way to more directly monetize their user base on Instagram, while also giving brands a way to sell merchandise to their followers.

title: The 10 Top Stocks to Buy For Q4
text: These are some of the top stocks to buy to finish the year with a profitable bang. The post The 10 Top Stocks to Buy For Q4 appeared first on InvestorPlace.

title: Facebook calls splitting off Instagram, WhatsApp a ‘nonstarter’
text: Facebook views the idea of splitting off Instagram and WhatsApp as a “nonstarter” that would cost billions of dollars and harm users, a new report says. The social-media giant has outlined its arguments against undoing two of its biggest acquisitions in a 14-page document as it faces crackdowns from federal regulators and congressional lawmakers, according.

title: 5 Unstoppable Stocks to Buy With $5,000
text: These industry leaders are consistently one-upping their competition.
